summary: My two vital save games useful for testing mods or receiving an advanced start in the game. there are two files Jane a Nord Assassin at level 8 and 21. this mod gives you a head start in the Thieves guild and the Dark Brotherhood! Smiting is at 100% and much more.
descriptionHtml:
[size=12][color=amber]Advanced Start[/color][/size]
Starting a new game? want a head start in the thieves guild and the dark brotherhood quests! Are you tired of restarting your game and spending hours in the smithy to reach 100% as a Black Smith! do you often heavily mod your game and need to start over due to conflicts! Do you want to have access to a critical time in the game, in which you are to decide to take down the Dark Brotherhood or join them! Do you want to test mods and not go through the intro? Do you want to always have a safe back up and a head start in the game, to save you from repeating the same quests! then this mod is for you! :)

[size=12][color=yellow]Description[/color][/size]
These are my personal saves, they don't have no mods installed, they are clean! and the only dependencies is the Skyrim.esm and the latest 1.9 Update.esm! the saves won't break your game! and have been tested since 8/25/2013 they are reliable, and ready to be modded! I don't see myself without a back up save! and as a modder I recommend others to always have a clean back up save without any mods installed like this one! it's tough after you reach 100 as a Black Smith! to start over again! so I have these saves as a backup! I believe it's vital to always have a back up save without any mods installed just in case! ;)

[size=10][color=white]Jane Level 21[/color][/size]

Jane is a Nord Assassin! She Spawns in Riften! she is already a member of the Thieves guild and the Dark Brotherhood! Shadowmere is unlocked! Black Smith level is at 100! this is the Advanced Start Version!

[size=5][color=yellow]Current Main Quests[/color][/size]
1. Before The Storm - Talk to the Jarl of Whiterun!
2. Hard Answers - Thieves Guild Quest!
3. The Cure For Madness - Cicero went berserk, he tried to kill Astrid and fled the Sanctuary! it's up to you to save the day!

[size=5][color=white]Completed Quests[/color][/size]
Unbound
A Chance Arrangement
Taking Care Of Business
The Burglary Job
Loud And Clear
Dampened Spirits
Scoundrel's Folly
Innocence Lost
Speaking With Silence
With Friends Like These
Sanctuary
Contract: Kill Beitild
Contract: Kill Papius
Contract: Kill Narfi
Mourning Never Comes
Whispers In The Dark
Contract: Kill Lurbuk
Contract: Kill Hern
The Silence Has been Broken
Bound Until Death
Breaching Security

[size=12][color=yellow]Jane Level 8[/color][/size]

Jane Spawns near Winterhold face to face with Karliah! I made this save game so I can always have access to a critical time in the game which is the choice to take down the Dark Brotherhood or join them! Once you sleep you will spawn directly in the abandoned shack and meet Astrid the leader of the Dark Brotherhood!

[size=5][color=white]Current Main Quests[/color][/size]

1. Hard Answers - "Karliah believes the only proof that could expose Mercer's Treachery can be found within the pages of Gallus's journal."

2. Before The Storm - (I like to complete the main quests after I gain more experience)

[size=5][color=white]Quests Completed[/color][/size]
Unbound
A Chance Arrangement
Taking Care Of Business
The Burglary Job
Loud And Clear
Dampened Spirits
Scoundrel's Folly
Innocence Lost
Speaking With Silence

[size=20][color=white]Requirements[/color][/size]
Skyrim.esm
Latest Update 1.9
(In both save games I cleaned the update.esm with Tes5Edit So I reccomend you clean the update.esm! before starting the save game! if you don't know how to clean mods with the Tes5edit here's an easy explanation! load up Tes5Edit, tick the mods you want to clean press ok! then right click "Remove Identical to Master" Records. The program will do it's job and after that is done right click the file again and press Undelete and Disable References! and your done! :)
Also make sure you run Wrye Bash! And tick the bashed patch!
